description: Enterprise techniques used by POORAIM, ATT&CK software S0216 v1.1
name: POORAIM (S0216)

techniques.comment: [POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) has been delivered through compromised sites acting as watering holes.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) can conduct file browsing.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) can enumerate processes.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) can perform screen capturing.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) can identify system information, including battery status.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
[POORAIM](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0216) has used AOL Instant Messenger for C2.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
